title: Magnetic Wireless Charger for iPhone: Fodable 3 in 1 Charging Station for Multiple Apple Devices - Travel Charging Pad Dock for Apple Watch iPhone 16 15 14 13 12 Pro Max Plus & Airpod Dark black
description: 3 in one Fold Up Charger Station: The wireless charging pad contains a magnetic suction, which can automatically and accurately charge the Apple 12 and above series. The magnetic suction is suitable for iPhone 16/16 Plus/16Pro/16 Pro max15/15 Plus/15Pro/15 Pro max/14/14 Pro/14 Plus/14 Pro Max/13/13 Pro/13 Pro Max/12/12 Pro/12 Pro Max. It is also compatible with Apple Watch Ultra 8 7 6 5 4 3 2 & AirPods with wireless charging.

top_reviews.title: Compact and powerful
top_reviews.body: This product is exactly what I was looking for in a travel charger. It accommodates nearly all my Apple products. I can use its charging cord to replenish my iPad, so with the charging areas for the watch, phone and AirPods, I don’t need all the other cords. As a test, I charged my phone and watch at the same time, but didn’t record exactly how long it took, but it was less than an hour for both. My AirPods Pro charged through its exterior case. So far, I have zero complaints about this product. Love the compactness and it works as a good secondary charging station in the home. Read more
